article: 2024 Farm Income Decline Confirmed in USDA Update
prediction: Net farm income in the U.S. will decrease by at least 4% in 2024 compared to 2023, leading to increased financial strain on small to medium-sized farms.

article: Another Sign of Trouble in the Ag Economy
prediction: Family farm bankruptcies in the U.S. will increase by at least 10% in 2025 compared to 2024 due to ongoing financial pressures.
